hero.name: Mahmoud Mohamed El-Zayat
hero.description: Detail-oriented Data Analyst with extensive hands-on experience delivering data-driven insights for government, real estate, automotive, retail, and marketing sectors across the Middle East and Europe. Proven track record of contributing to high-impact projects for organizations such as Abdul Latif Jameel Automotive, Abdul Samad Al Qurashi, and large-scale real estate market studies in Saudi Arabia.Highly skilled in Python, SQL, Power BI, Excel, and Tableau, with a strong academic background in business and accounting. Experienced in transforming complex datasets into actionable insights that support strategic decision-making in sales, finance, marketing, and commercial operations. Recognized for strong analytical thinking, problem-solving abilities, effective communication, and seamless collaboration with cross-functional and international teams.

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro: We put your ideas and thus your wishes in the form of a unique web project that inspires you and your customers.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.intro: Get in touch via phone, email, or social networks.
